feed.title: Mount Carleton (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mount Carleton (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:59 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.summary: Snow. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023
